alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 2:29AM MST until January 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Extended period of snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Blowing snow expected with winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Much of Carbon County in Wyoming including Baggs, Rawlins, and Arlington. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times in moderate snowfall. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility below one-half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County
